header.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: this is a description about me

about.about_content: Hello! I'am Takoua, a passionate Front End Developer with a keen eye for design and knack for crafting seamless use experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I specialize in building  responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications.
about.innovative: I thrive on introducing fresh, innovative ideas that bring value to every project. I approach problem-solving uniquely, ensuring that the projects I work on are not only functional but also exceptionally captivating and engaging.
about.creative: I derive immense satisfaction from taking on complex challenges, utilizing my sharp analytical skills, and deploying a meticulous attention to detail to deconstruct problems. This approach allows me to consistently deliver high-quality, impactful results.

skills.description: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.desc: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.polo_loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve?
